question: The new committee system constitutes an improvement over the earlier committee system in so far as
option1: it assures representation to all the political parties in proportion to their strength in the Parliament
option2: it enables the Parliament to examine the grants of all the ministries and departments in detail
option3: it enables the Parliament to accept the demands of various ministries without scrutiny
answer: it enables the Parliament to examine the grants of all the ministries and departments in detail
explanation: No answer description available for this question. Let us discuss.
